effect.sun_moon: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

short_effect.sun_moon: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
